Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-23653 affecting package moby-cli for versions less than 20.10.27-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-23653 affecting package moby-cli for versions less than 20.10.27-3. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-cli is earlier than 20.10.27-3, affected by CVE-2024-23653
